title: Welcome
text:
Hello new worker!

Welcome to your first work station.
Here you will learn how to get the best out of your new mechanical body with our latest training methods and equipment.
As you already know, the more you benefit our cause, the more you benefit yourself.
Please follow the green line on the floor to the main building.

Sincerely yours
-
Research Artificial Intelligence Department


P.S.
You can access this message and your first quest from the button.
